resources.string: Donuts are glazed and sprinkled with candy.\nPrice: 4$
Ice cream sandwiches have chocolate wafers and vanilla filling.\nPrice: 5$
Our coffee is the best coffee in town.It is made with a lot of love.\nPrice: 8$
You ordered an ice cream sandwich.
Attention! Your order will be placed!

How do I place my order?
 You may place your order through:
 1) Order online through our online ordering system
 2) Calling our office numbers at 6440 8084 or 6440 8075
 3) Fax your order form to our fax number at 6344 9225
 4) Email your order form to order@crisscoffe.com
 5) Purchase from our shop directly as walk-in customers at 25 George Baritiu

 What is the minimum order?
 The minimum order for delivery is $5.00, excluding a delivery charge depending on the location of delivery.

 What can I expect after I have placed an order?
 You would receive an email and/or a phone call from us once the order has been processed. Your order is only be confirmed after you have received the email and/or the phone call.

 If I would like to make changes to my order, how do I go about doing so?
 If you would like to make changes to your order, you may:
 1) Call our office numbers at 6440 8084 or 6440 8075 during office hours
 2) Email us at order@crisscoffe.com, indicating your name and contact number so as to allow us to get back to you as soon as possible

 I would like to postpone/cancel my order. When is the last day I may do so?
 Postponement and cancellations of any orders have to be done 1 hour prior to the delivery date

 What are the various payment modes available?
 You may make your payment via:
 1) Cash on delivery
 2) Cheque
 3) Vendors@gov E-invoice ( For Government Agencies only)
 4) PayNow
 5) GrabPay

Please indicate to us the mode of payment when ordering. Alternatively, you may also make payment at our office at 69 Joo Chiat Place. Payment have to be made 1 day before delivery.

 Do you deliver to all locations?
 We deliver to all locations, except to Lim Chu Kang and all offshore islands

 When are the delivery services available?
 Delivery services are available from Mondays to Saturdays, excluding Public Holidays.
 For urgent deliveries on Sundays and Public Holidays, kindly contact our sales team. Additional surcharge will be chargeable depending on order.

 I would like to collect the purchases myself. Am I able to do so?
 Yes, you are able to collect the purchases yourself at our office if you do not want the goods to be delivered to you. However, please do state Self-Collection in the Delivery Address section of the order form.
